casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Jeffrey GIBSON. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 15, 2016.

David B. Rozwaski, in support of the petition.

Denise B. Smoker, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 56 Conn.App. 154, 742 A.2d 397 (1999), is denied.

ESPINOSA and ROBINSON, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
